trans-unit.resname: W16·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Name
W16·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: W16·1 | Aegis Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control CARDNAME. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，另一个目标永久物获得不灭异能。（注明「消灭」的效应不会消灭它。伤害无法消灭具不灭异能的生物。）

W16·2 | Marked by Honor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
W16·2 | Marked by Honor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有警戒异能。（它攻击时不需横置。）
